meanings.definition: The quality or state of being repetitious.
meanings.sent1: Her speech had a repetitiousness that made it hard to stay focused.
meanings.sent2: The repetitiousness of the song's chorus made it catchy.
meanings.sent3: The repetitiousness of the joke eventually made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The repetitiousness of the waves crashing against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The repetitiousness of the clock ticking echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: The act of repeating something excessively.
meanings.sent1: The repetitiousness of his excuses made them less believable.
meanings.sent2: The repetitiousness of the advertisement annoyed viewers.
meanings.sent3: The repetitiousness of the cat meowing for food was comical.
meanings.sent4: The repetitiousness of the alarm clock ringing woke him up abruptly.
meanings.sent5: The repetitiousness of the car horn honking outside was irritating.
